#text=I found a beautiful little tree at the local nursery and brought it home to plant in my garden .
#text=I had already picked the spot it was to go , a place in the middle of my yard where it could get full sun .
#text=After gathering the shovel and watering hose , and putting on my gardening gloves , I set to work on digging the hole .
#text=I had to make sure the hole was deep enough to fit its roots comfortably .
#text=I dampened the soil in the hole with a little water .
#text=Once the hole was ready , I laid the tree on its side and gently removed the pot from it .
#text=I placed the sapling into the hole and looked to see that the base of its trunk would be level with the ground , then began scraping the soil back into the hole , over the roots .
#text=I tamped the soil down , so as to prevent any air pockets , and watered it once more .
#text=I think this little tree will make a wonderful addition to my yard !
